plot: Rogue receptionist, Zoe, sees a chance to prove herself and recruits a group of talented teens to form the band Totally Amp'd. But they must overcome their differences if they want a shot at winning the musical competition of their lives.
plot_en: Rogue receptionist, Zoe, sees a chance to prove herself and recruits a group of talented teens to form the band Totally Amp'd. But they must overcome their differences if they want a shot at winning the musical competition of their lives.
plot_es: Rogue receptionist, Zoe, sees a chance to prove herself and recruits a group of talented teens to form the band Totally Amp'd. But they must overcome their differences if they want a shot at winning the musical competition of their lives.
title: Totally Amp'd
